mapper.select: SELECT p.PNO, p.TITLE, m.NAME, p.POSTS_CREATEDATE, p.VIEWS, p.likeCount FROM Posts p LEFT JOIN Member m ON p.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID

SELECT p.pno, p.TITLE, m.nickname, p.likeCount, p.VIEWS, p.posts_createdate, COUNT(c.pno) AS commentsCount FROM Posts p LEFT JOIN Member m ON p.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN comments c ON p.pno = c.pno GROUP BY p.pno, p.TITLE, m.nickname, p.likeCount, p.VIEWS, p.posts_createdate
